Kural_Info.Chapter: அவையறிதல் (The Knowledge of the Council Chamber)
Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: உணர்வ துடையார்முன் சொல்லல் வளர்வதன்பாத்தியுள் நீர்சொரிந் தற்று.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Lecturing to those who have the ability to understand (for themselves) is like watering a bed of plants that are growing (of themselves).

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A speaker is sharing knowledge ('சொல்லல்') with an audience of perceptive, intelligent people ('உணர்வது உடையார் முன்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: The audience is visualized as a fertile garden bed ('பாத்தி') where healthy, vibrant saplings are already growing well on their own ('வளர்வதன்').
Layered_Composition.Background: The speaker's words are visualized as a gentle, life-giving stream of water ('நீர் சொரிந்து'). This water doesn't force the plants to grow, but it nourishes them, accelerates their already excellent growth, and helps them reach their full potential, resulting in a lush, abundant harvest.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A beautiful simile: speaking before an intelligent and receptive audience is as effective and fruitful as watering a fertile bed of already growing plants.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The receptive audience as a fertile, growing garden is the central metaphor. The words as nourishing water show that the act of speaking is a catalyst for growth, not the sole cause of it. The result is an effortless and magnificent flourishing.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A bright, warm, sunlit scene. The garden is a vibrant, healthy green. The water of the words is a clear, sparkling, silver-blue. The entire palette is one of life, fertility, and abundance.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A wide, beautiful shot of the speaker 'watering' the 'garden' of the audience, with a time-lapse effect showing the accelerated, fruitful growth.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, hyper-realistic, with beautiful, naturalistic detail on the plants and the water.

Cultural_Anchors: Speaking before those who understand (உணர்வது உடையார் முன் சொல்லல்)
Watering a bed of growing (plants) (வளர்வதன் பாத்தியுள் நீர் சொரிந்தற்று)
